text: mariyu memu oka sandesanni (ayat nu) marci dani sthananlo maroka sandesanni avatarimpajesinappudu; tanu denni eppudu avatarimpajesado allah ku baga telusu. (Ayina) varu (satyatiraskarulu) ila antaru: "Niscayanga nive (o muham'mad!) Dinini kalpincevadavu." Asalu varilo cala mandi (yathartham) telusukoleru
